DOC.brief_summary: The investigators' hypothesis is that patients with apical ballooning syndrome (ABS) will manifest a personality profile that differs than that of a population of similar range of ethnic and socioeconomic status.
DOC.brief_title: Personality Profile of Patients With Apical Ballooning Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Patients who have suffered with ABS 2. Adults (18 years or older) 3. Able to read English at a 6th grade level (questionnaires are selfadministered and written in English) Exclusion criteria: 1. Have withdrawn from the registry 2. Have died
